thread.title: Avitus Group Announces Employee(s) of the Quarter; Congratulates Payroll Inception Team for Excellent Service and Commitment to Clients
thread.title_full: Avitus Group Announces Employee(s) of the Quarter; Congratulates Payroll Inception Team for Excellent Service and Commitment to Clients

author: Dianne Parker
title: Avitus Group Announces Employee(s) of the Quarter; Congratulates Payroll Inception Team for Excellent Service and Commitment to Clients
text:
Avitus Group's payroll inception team was nominated by their co-workers and selected by the company's Employee of the Quarter Committee for making significant contributions to the company, clients and co-workers. The committee selected the payroll inception team: Lori Molodecki, Mary Wiebusch, Tyleen Degele and Chansie Van Dyke for the award. Nominations from co-workers describe the team as truly amazing in the member on-boarding process, stating that not many people have the drive they do, and that they are remarkable to work with. Co-workers say this group works from 3 in the morning until 8 at night some days to make sure Avitus Group members are given the highest quality service. "It is very rare for Avitus Group to select multiple people for the employee of the quarter award, but in this case, the company made an exception. The entire payroll inception team has worked together to give our newest clients the best service possible. Member on-boarding is a first impression opportunity. Lori, Mary, Tyleen and Chansie are the definition of true professionals who work extremely hard, while always having a great attitude. This team represents all of the employees here at Avitus Group well," says Avitus Group Public Relations Manager, Dianne Parker.
Avitus Group's employee of the quarter program is designed to recognize an employee who has made a significant contribution to the company and its clients. "Our Employee of the Quarter Committee received many great nominations, but the payroll inception team nominations stood out. We're very lucky to have each of these employees here at Avitus Group," commented Avitus Group, Inc. President, Don Reile.
Avitus Group awards the employee of the quarter with the choice of a paid day off or a $75.00 gift certificate to a restaurant of their choice and $50.00 in Avitus Group apparel. In addition, the employee receives a certificate signed by the president of Avitus Group, Inc.
"'We're very honored that we were nominated as a team for this award. We rely so much on each other, whether it be helping with a payroll or bouncing ideas off one another. We are so appreciative of this recognition. Thank you to Avitus Group," says the Avitus Group Payroll Inception Team.
Lori Molodecki has worked at Avitus Group for more than 8 years and has been promoted 4 times. Mary Wiebusch has worked at the company for 2 years and has been promoted 1 time. Tyleen Degele has worked at Avitus Group for 1.5 years and has been promoted 1 time. Chansie Van Dyke has worked at Avitus Group for 1.5 years and has been promoted 1 time. In addition, Van Dyke was recognized individually as the employee of the quarter during the first quarter of 2015 .
Avitus Group is a worldwide company. Avitus Group simplifies, strengthens and grows businesses by providing 'back office' support. Things like bookkeeping, taxes, payroll, IT, marketing and much more. When businesses use Avitus Group, all of the necessary yet burdensome functions of the business become Avitus Group's responsibility so the business can focus on what they do best. Avitus Group serves clients nationwide through regional office locations from coast to coast. The company also serves international clients through partner locations in Europe, Canada, China, England, India, Japan and Singapore.
